CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Add to Cart stage positioned above or below the Visit Product Page stage?
SRP.A: The Add to Cart stage is positioned {below} the Visit Product Page stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Wishlist?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Wishlist is {5090}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete Purchase is {1594}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Cart?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Cart is {3442}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Visit Product Page, with a value of {7907}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Leave Product Review, with a value of {1287}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {0} Users from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Visit Product Page to stage Add to Wishlist?
SC.A: Decreased by {2817} Users from stage Visit Product Page to stage Add to Wishlist.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 6498? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1440? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1594 and 2857? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initiate Checkout} stage has {2273}, the {Enter Payment Information} stage has {1594}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {1594}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete Purchase to Leave Product Review, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Wishlist} to {Add to Cart} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, or from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to {Add to Wishlist} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart, from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, or from stage Complete Purchase to Leave Product Review?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to stage {Add to Wishlist} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, or from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Cart} to stage {Initiate Checkout} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Visit Product Page} and {Add to Wishlist} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Enter Payment Information} and {Complete Purchase} stages.
